verses.name: Exodus 32:15
verses.text: And Moses turned, and went down from the mount, and the two tables of the testimony were in his hand: the tables were written on both their sides; on the one side and on the other were they written.

verses.name: Exodus 32:16
verses.text: And the tables were the work of God, and the writing was the writing of God, graven upon the tables.

verses.name: Exodus 32:17
verses.text: And when Joshua heard the noise of the people as they shouted, he said unto Moses, There is a noise of war in the camp.
